subject: History
title: Hubble Telescope: Eyes in Space
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Hubble Telescope: Eyes in Space.

hook.text: The most important telescope ever built launched with a flawed mirror. NASA had to send astronauts to fix it in orbit.

buildup.text: The Hubble Space Telescope launched in 1990 to observe the universe without Earth's atmosphere blurring the view.

discovery.text: Its first images were blurry. A grinding error had made the primary mirror too flat by just 2.2 micrometers.

twist.text: In 1993, astronauts installed corrective optics in orbitâ€”giving Hubble contact lenses. The images became stunning.

climax.text: Hubble revealed the universe's age (13.8 billion years), confirmed dark energy, and captured iconic deep-field images.

punchline.text: A flawed mirror showed us the universe more clearly than ever.

quiz.question: What problem did the Hubble Space Telescope have after launch?
options: Its solar panels failed to deploy in orbit
Its primary mirror had a tiny grinding error that blurred images
It was placed in the wrong orbit around Earth
